firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Introducing DocArray - A type agnostic data structure!
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Shubham Saboo, Jyoti Bisht
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: This blog post will introduce DocArray, define its advantages, and help you to understand its usage.

firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Advancing Open Domain Question Answering with RocketQA
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Nan Wang, Shubham Saboo
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: In this blog post, we will see how RocketQA helps us to create state-of-the-art Question Answering systems with Jina

firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Sharing DocumentArray Across Machines
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Shubham Saboo, Jyoti Bisht
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: In this blog post, we will see how DocumentArray's Push and Pull method allows us to export and import DocumentArray to and from the cloud.
